title: Waiting for Wednesday
description: Lane used to be hands off and Tris knew it. He followed the rules and left her alone. Now she’s back and the game has changed.When Lane returned, she believed she could resist the far-too-sexy Tris. A life of disappointment had destroyed her ability to love, to trust a man.Or so she thought.Waiting for Wednesdsay is the third book in New York Times bestselling author Mari Carr’s Wild Irish series.
author: Mari Carr
